name: Fatal Fragment
description:
A brutal first-person shooter inspired by retro-styled FPS games.
Choose from a variety of weapons and tools.
Create your path through this harsh, post-apocalyptic environment.
Complete all objectives in this brutal, enemy-filled prototype level.
Controls:

(Mouse and keyboard only)

[MOUSE LEFT CLICK] : Use Weapon / Use Bandage

[MOUSE SCROLL] : Cycle Weapons

[1][2][3] : Select Weapons

[4] : Select Bandages

[E] : Interact / Use Tool

[R] : Reload

[SPACE] : Jump

[CTRL] : Crouch / [C] : Crouch (Web version)

[ESCAPE] : Pause /  [ENTER] : Pause (Web version)


Tips:

-  Best played tactically!

- Use tools to distract enemies, they pick up new way-points to patrol based on sound and vision anomalies!

 - Best played at the default windowed 4:3 aspect ratio!


** KNOWN BUGS & ISSUES **

Known issues (besides overall polish, etc) include sometimes janky  AI, the odd enemy shooting at you through a wall (mostly harmless), using meds sometimes needs a double-click to work and probably other things...enjoy!
